  always @(posedge clk) begin
    if((tdd_enable_s == 1) && (tdd_gated_tx_dmapath_s == 1)) begin
      tdd_tx_valid <= tdd_tx_dp_en_s;

      tdd_tx_valid <= 1'b1;
    end
  end
